children.name: download_image
children.description: An image that displays the piece of content that a user would download on the thank you page.

children.name: heading
children.description: A heading that describes the page, which is intended to allow the user to download a piece of content.

children.name: description
children.description: A few sentences that describe the piece of content the user will download.

children.name: button_text
children.description: The button text that describes the call to action the user should take which is downloading a piece of content.

children.name: button_link
children.description: The URL that a user should be taken to when they click the button.

children.name: heading
children.description: A heading that describes the next steps that a user should take after downloading the piece of content.

children.name: subheading
children.description: A subheading that shows under the heading describing the next steps that a user should take after downloading the piece of content.

children.name: image
children.description: An image that is related to the first step that the user should take after downloading the piece of content.

children.name: heading
children.description: A heading that is related to the first step that the user should take after downloading the piece of content.

children.name: description
children.description: A short one sentence description that is related to the first step that the user should take after downloading the piece of content.

children.name: image
children.description: An image that is related to the second step that the user should take after downloading the piece of content.

children.name: heading
children.description: A heading that is related to the second step that the user should take after downloading the piece of content.

children.name: description
children.description: A short one sentence description that is related to the second step that the user should take after downloading the piece of content.

children.name: image
children.description: An image that is related to the third step that the user should take after downloading the piece of content.

children.name: heading
children.description: A heading that is related to the third step that the user should take after downloading the piece of content.

children.name: description
children.description: A short one sentence description that is related to the third step that the user should take after downloading the piece of content.
